org.livingdoc.api.conversion

Annotation Type Language


  • @Retention
 @Target
public Language

    Overrides the used language (java.util.Locale) for the annotated field or parameter. A full list of interface TypeConverter considering this annotation can be found in the documentation. The org.livingdoc.api.conversion.Language$value() has to be specified according to the BCP 47 standard.

    Examples for this are: de, de-DE, en-US etc.

    See Also:
    java.util.Locale, interface TypeConverter, org.livingdoc.api.conversion.Language$value(), BCP 47, java.util.Locale#forLanguageTag(String)
